body_html:
tensorflow/core/api_def/api_test.cc:201: Failure 2429 Value of: api_defs_map_.find(op.name()) != api_defs_map_.end() 2430 Actual: false 2431 Expected: true 2432 StatelessRandomUniformInt op does not have api_def_*.pbtxt file. Please add api_def_StatelessRandomUniformInt.pbtxt file under tensorflow/core/api_def/base_api/ directory. 2433 you will need to move your .Doc() op docstrings into a pbtxt
…
On Wed, Sep 19, 2018 at 9:39 AM, Geoffrey Irving ***@***.***> wrote: stateless_random_uniform now take minval+maxval and handles ints, and stateless_normal/stateless_truncated_normal take mean+stddev. Additionally, all of the stateless functions now have proper doc strings. This is step one of moving stateless random numbers out of contrib. I've only tested this on my laptop, which means only on CPU, so some test iteration may be required. ------------------------------ You can view, comment on, or merge this pull request online at: #22386 Commit Summary - Expand stateless random generators to match their stateful cousins File Changes - *M* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/BUILD <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-0> (2) - *M* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/__init__.py <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-1> (8) - *M* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/python/kernel_tests/stateless_ random_ops_test.py <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-2> (154) - *A* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/python/stateless_ops.py <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-3> (214) - *M* tensorflow/core/kernels/random_op.cc <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-4> (34) - *M* tensorflow/core/kernels/stateless_random_ops.cc <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-5> (119) - *M* tensorflow/core/ops/stateless_random_ops.cc <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-6> (53) Patch Links: - https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386.patch - https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386.diff — You are receiving this because your review was requested. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#22386>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ABtim1aG96yB5SHgVQm585JDpJ6bYIlcks5ucnM6gaJpZM4Wwi4b> .

tensorflow/core/api_def/api_test.cc:201: Failure
2429
Value of: api_defs_map_.find(op.name()) != api_defs_map_.end()
2430
Actual: false
2431
Expected: true
2432
StatelessRandomUniformInt op does not have api_def_*.pbtxt file. Please add
api_def_StatelessRandomUniformInt.pbtxt file under
tensorflow/core/api_def/base_api/ directory.
2433



you will need to move your .Doc() op docstrings into a pbtxt
…
On Wed, Sep 19, 2018 at 9:39 AM, Geoffrey Irving ***@***.***> wrote:
 stateless_random_uniform now take minval+maxval and handles ints,
 and stateless_normal/stateless_truncated_normal take mean+stddev.
 Additionally, all of the stateless functions now have proper doc
 strings.

 This is step one of moving stateless random numbers out of contrib.

 I've only tested this on my laptop, which means only on CPU, so some test
 iteration may be required.
 ------------------------------
 You can view, comment on, or merge this pull request online at:

   #22386
 Commit Summary

    - Expand stateless random generators to match their stateful cousins

 File Changes

    - *M* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/BUILD
    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-0> (2)
    - *M* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/__init__.py
    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-1> (8)
    - *M* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/python/kernel_tests/stateless_
    random_ops_test.py
    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-2>
    (154)
    - *A* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/python/stateless_ops.py
    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-3>
    (214)
    - *M* tensorflow/core/kernels/random_op.cc
    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-4>
    (34)
    - *M* tensorflow/core/kernels/stateless_random_ops.cc
    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-5>
    (119)
    - *M* tensorflow/core/ops/stateless_random_ops.cc
    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-6>
    (53)

 Patch Links:

    - https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386.patch
    - https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386.diff

 —

tensorflow/core/api_def/api_test.cc:201: Failure
2429
Value of: api_defs_map_.find(op.name()) != api_defs_map_.end()
2430
Actual: false
2431
Expected: true
2432
StatelessRandomUniformInt op does not have api_def_*.pbtxt file. Please add
api_def_StatelessRandomUniformInt.pbtxt file under
tensorflow/core/api_def/base_api/ directory.
2433



you will need to move your .Doc() op docstrings into a pbtxt

> iteration may be required.
